mapper.select:
select reportnum,report_content,reviewnum,m_id,review_content,review_image,r from ( select p.reportnum reportnum,p.report_content report_content ,p.reviewnum reviewnum,p.m_id m_id,r.review_content review_content ,r.review_image review_image,rownum r from report p inner join review r on p.reviewnum = r.reviewnum order by p.reportnum desc )
where r>=#{sno} and r<=#{eno}
